body.name: Biokleen Laundry Detergent Liquid - 64 HE Loads - Concentrated, Eco-Friendly, Non-Toxic, Plant-Based, No Artificial Fragrance or Preservatives, 32 Fl Oz, Citrus Essence
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 30 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging. U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: PLANT-BASED LAUNDRY DETERGENT: Biokleen uses plant-derived cleaning agents to eliminate tough stains and odors, leaving your clothes crisp and fresh.

FOR USE IN STANDARD AND HIGH EFFICIENCY WASHING MACHINES: Biokleen works great in High Efficiency and Standard washers. It uses zero artificial fragrances or dyes and leaves a natural, fresh scent on your clothes and fabrics
ULTRA-CONCENTRATED: Biokleen laundry products are 3X concentrated to reduce packaging, waste and energy.

NO HARSH INGREDIENTS: Biokleen liquid laundry soaps are plant-based, eco-friendly solutions with no artificial fragrances or dyes. Our products never contain phosphates, chlorine, ammonia, or brighteners.
NEVER TESTED ON ANIMALS AND MADE IN THE USA: Biokleen products are never tested on animals, use biodegradable ingredients and are proudly manufactured in America.
body.description: For dirty or smelly laundry, it's Biokleen to the rescue. Our formulas use powerful plant-derived and mineral-based cleaning agents to breakup stains and eliminate odors, leaving clothes clean, fresh and smelling great. Safer Choice certified, Biokleen Laundry products are highly concentrated to reduce packaging, waste and energy use. Biokleen is proudly manufactured in the U.S. and made with a commitment to people, pets and our planet. With a natural citrus essence, this two-pack makes it easier than ever to keep laundry fresh. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and smells good
reviews.reviewText: I love the citrus version of this detergent. It’s effective at cleaning my clothes and has a pleasant, light scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells lemony good
reviews.reviewText: I like this detergent - I use less and it smells good (if you like lemons). Knowing that it is plant based and eco-friendly makes me feel good about using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but used to be better.
reviews.reviewText: Update 09/26/23:While this still gets things clean, since having been repackaged into the new light orange bottles, the ingredients have definitely changed. The detergent is thinner than it was, and leaves a lot less scent versus the original pink packaging. I think I will go out of my way even if I have to pay more, for the original formula next time. Dropping to 4 stars instead of 5.Original:Love the light scent this leaves on my clothing. Cleans well too, as with any detergent I do add white vinegar for extra cleaning power when neccessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It gets stains out
reviews.reviewText: I like how clean things get

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best laundry detergent and the fragrance is the best
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased this item at least 20 times from Amazon for $ 9.49 and now they want to charge me $17.42, which is obscene! Trying to hold me hostage, since they know that I have purchased this item for years. What a slap in my face! This is not the first item I have purchased multiple times on subscribe and save (whatever sure it is) and then they try to price gouge me saying its no longer available unless you pay double! Wanted me to switch to a different scent and a larger bottle, which I DO NOT have room for a larger bottle on my shelf and I DO NOT want another scent!!!! So its Walmart to the rescue! Buyer beware I guess ....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many environmentally friendly laundry detergents but keep on coming back to this one because I like the smell. It also does great at removing dirt and odors, pretreating stains is still necessary, but always is. I got the smallest bottle because it’s so much easier to handle, I fill it back up from a larger bottle of the same detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This smelled nice in the bottle and it does get a lot of HE loads done. BUT, although my clothes looked clean coming frkm the dryer, they still smelled like dirty socks. This may work better with scented crystals in the washer and dryer sheets. But that defeats the purpose of trying to find something more "clean" to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've tried many detergents to get the smell out of clothes but this one does the best job thus far. I will be using this for a long time to come. A little goes a long way, cost effective.
